title: 客户端无法登入服务器
author: mowangluanshi
txt_content:
求助，单机测试的时候可以的，将mod放入服务器生成新世界后，从客户端登入却失败了，看了下Log关键的错误信息应该是下面这个
[04:37:01] [Client thread/INFO] [FML]: Injecting existing registry data into this client instance
[04:37:01] [Client thread/INFO] [FML]: Registry Item: Found a missing id from the world galacticraftcore:bucket_fuel
[04:37:01] [Client thread/INFO] [FML]: Registry Item: Found a missing id from the world galacticraftcore:bucket_oil
[04:37:01] [Client thread/ERROR] [FML]: Unidentified mapping from registry minecraft:items
[04:37:01] [Client thread/ERROR] [FML]:     galacticraftcore:bucket_fuel: 7366
[04:37:01] [Client thread/ERROR] [FML]:     galacticraftcore:bucket_oil: 7364
[04:37:01] [Netty Client IO #1/ERROR] [FML]: Network Disconnect: Fatally missing registry entries
[04:37:01] [Netty Client IO #1/FATAL] [FML]: Failed to connect to server: there are 2 missing registry items

谷歌百度都搜了下但是都没找到有效的解决方法【也可能是我搜索的姿势不对，搜到个类似的是跟BC有关的但是我并没有装BC】。。。。。请问下各位有没有遇到过类似的问题以及解决方案

replies.txt_content:
Found a missing id from the world galacticraftcore:bucket_fuel
Found a missing id from the world galacticraftcore:bucket_oil
这是缺少mod了吧，世界地图里有这个mod物品，但是你却没有加载上mod

replies.author: lzh5598
replies.txt_content: 是否安装过末影接口Mod，如果有，可以考虑加回。

replies.author: mowangluanshi
replies.txt_content:
lzh5598 发表于 2019-11-18 08:40
是否安装过末影接口Mod，如果有，可以考虑加回。
这个检查几遍了确定没少，星系是我这次的核心mod不可能漏的

replies.author: mowangluanshi
replies.txt_content:
lzh5598 发表于 2019-11-18 08:40
是否安装过末影接口Mod，如果有，可以考虑加回。
倒是曾经装过bc，但是我已经删了mod，config和world后才重新生成世界的，难道还有什么要删
